function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mosquitoes not flying over high walls or far distances limits the effectiveness of insecticide dissemination","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness in controlling mosquito populations and vector-borne diseases","Mitigation":"Utilizing auto-dissemination devices at higher densities to compensate for limited flying range of mosquitoes","Technologies":"Auto-dissemination devices, improved insecticide dissemination techniques","People":"Urban residents, particularly those living near mosquito breeding sites","Owner":"Local government, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate water access leading to water storage practices that enable mosquito proliferation and disease transmission","Impact":"Increased mosquito populations and higher risk of vector-borne diseases","Mitigation":"Improving water access and storage practices to reduce mosquito breeding sites","Technologies":"Improved water infrastructure, water storage management techniques","People":"Urban residents with inadequate water access","Owner":"Local government, water management agencies"},{"Description":"Solid waste providing breeding sites for mosquitoes","Impact":"Increased mosquito breeding and higher risk of vector-borne diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing solid waste management practices to reduce mosquito breeding sites","Technologies":"Solid waste management systems, waste disposal technologies","People":"Urban residents, particularly those living near areas with poor waste management","Owner":"Local government, waste management agencies"}]}
